forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies this afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 13C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 56F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. SE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. SE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 14C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 57F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
